errors.OS error: OS error occurred while handling the file!
errors.Download error: Error occurred. Please check the URL and your network connection!
errors.Network error: Network error. Please check your internet connection!
errors.File exceeds maximum length: File name exceeds the maximum length of 100 characters!
errors.Suspicious file name: The filename seems suspicious and contains a blocked extension!
errors.Extraction error: Error during text extraction from the file!
errors.Payload Too Large: File size exceeds the maximum limit of 5 MB!
errors.Processing error: An error occurred while processing the request!
